title: Seth Rogen | Trump's Week of Corruption Scandals: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the truly unprecedented level of corruption swirling around the president of the United States.

Then, Seth Rogen tells Seth about his horrible Golden Globes accident, explains why he doesn't like cruise ships and reveals how he won a game show with his sister by cheating.

After that, Rogen takes a few more questions backstage with Late Night producer Kevin Miller.
